artist: Julie Mehretu, American (born Ethiopia); Co-published by Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Co-published by Walker Art Center , Minneapolis
description: geometric architectural designs in center with staircase, building and grid; multicolored swatches of color at edges; lines and curves in black and color radiate outward from center; horizontal composition
marks: Signature; Date; Edition Signed, dated in pencil, LRC: [Mehretu 2004]
title: Entropia (review)
